titleStmt.title: The blessed estate of them that die in the Lord opened in a sermon at the funerals of Mistres Jane Blackwel, wife of Master Elidad Blackwel, pastor of Andrew Undershaft, London / by Tho. Manton.
titleStmt.author: Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
